item.title: Your First 2D Game
item.description: Your First 2D Game Get started with Godot by building a 2D shooter. In this series, we’ll start with the basics and build a classic, old-school space shooter. Here’s a screenshot of the finished game: In each part of the series, we’ll build a piece of the game, adding features and explaining the process along the way.
